Text: Check to enable all mods upon exit. Restart required and this is automatically unchecked.
Check to disable all mods upon exit. Restart required and this is automatically unchecked.
Semi-colon ';' separated list of mod IDs to keep enabled if "Disable All" is checked.
Enable mods with IDs from the 'mods.txt' file. It should be in the mod's folder.
Save enabled mods to the 'mods.txt' file. It will be in the mod's folder.
Open the folder where the 'mods.txt' file is located.
